channel.title: Pages on Konstantin Nazarov
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Konstantin Nazarov

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, My name is Konstantin. I’m a software engineering professional with 10 years of experience. During my career I worked with a diverse set of technologies, ranging from RTOS kernel development to highly loaded web services. Currently work at a database startup Tarantool where I manage a team building enterprise solutions based off our own database and application server. I also offer consulting in application architecture and implementing MVPs. For individuals I offer productivity and goal setting coaching.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you have a question that I can answer in a few messages, just email me at mail@kn.am. Otherwise PM me on Telegram.
